  Class java.Nutmeg.ExceptionBlock



java.lang.Object
   |
   +----java.Nutmeg.ExceptionBlock






  
 public class ExceptionBlock
  
 extends Object


Copyright (c) 1995, 1996 THOUGHT Inc. All Rights Reserved.

ExceptionBlock class (a base class for Nutmeg exceptions).
This class implements a method call doException which is what's called
when this exception class is invoked.  This could be inherited from to
handle the exceptions in a user configurable way.





  




  
 
	doException()
  
 Executes with no parameters.





  



doException

  public boolean doException()




  
 Executes with no parameters.
  

    
 Returns:
    
 boolean True if successful execution of exception Block.
